job description:
Title: Azure Data Analyst

Location: Redmond, WA

Duration: 12-18 Months

Required Skills
  • Candidate Should have strong work experience in Data Analyst
  • Should have Strong Data Mining, Data Analyzing experience & who can extract the data from different stores
  • Should have strong experience with Cosmos & Scope
  • Must have experience in SQL and handling large amount of data
  • Familiar with Azure Telemetry & Cloud would be plus.
  • Familiar with VMs (Virtual Machines) s plus.
  • Must have Experience with Excel, Power Pivot
  • Experience with building dashboards in PowerBI is Preferred
  • Experience with predictive analytics is Preferred.
  • Somebody who is comfortable generating ideas and not just takes orders
